title: Miyuko les Gourmandise
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A combination of a cafe, bakery, tea room and Patisserie-boutique. Everything is in-house-made. Some vegan offerings are cakes, cupcakes, pralines, matcha ice cream, matcha latte and matcha cakes. A vegan brunch and vegan high tea are both available and need to be reserved in advance.
